caption.p: Optical photos of flexible silver nanowire membrane ( a, b). ( c) Low- and ( d) high-magnification SEM images of a silver nanowire membrane. XRD patterns of the silver nanowire membrane before and after cyclic voltammetry (CV) treatment (cycle number: 15; temperature: 20 °C) ( e) and the XPS of the silver nanowire membrane before and after CV treatment (cycle number: 15; temperature: 20 °C) ( f).
